org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.io.registry

Class HadoopRdfIORegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.io.registry.HadoopRdfIORegistry

  • public class HadoopRdfIORegistry
extends Object
    A registry which is used by various classes to dynamically select record readers and writers based on a provided Lang

    Readers and writers are dynamically discovered using the Java ServiceLoader mechanism. This will look for files under META-INF/services named org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.io.registry.ReaderFactory and org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.io.registry.WriterFactory. This follows the standard ServiceLoader format of provided one class name per line which implements the relevant interface.
